summary:
this house mod is still VARY much a W.I.P
Location: in whiterun  
I need someone  that can do navmesh, if you can help please msg me thx
descriptionHtml:
this is a house I am currently working on. and the reason why I am uploading this at such a beta stage is because i would like feed back on what should i do and what to put in there and for you the modding community to also find any bugs that i need to fix. I\'m also planing on remodeling the whole basement but that\'s in the future. 

And what this is that it takes the good old bannered mare and turns the upstairs into a player home. 

Beta tester: 1000yrdshot

feel free to add  pictures of the place 


I have school so i will try to get as much done as I can and like i said this vary much a beta so dont hate plz it will get better.
author: Jonah873
